title: Danny & Kal Penn (Actor/Author)
itunes:title: Danny & Kal Penn (Actor/Author)
description:
Danny chats with actor Kal Penn about his career in movies like Harold and Kumar, Van Wilder, and more! Plus, his time in the White House, coming out, and more from his new book, You Can't Be Serious, available now in paperback!


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
